channel.title: Online Status
channel.description: I need to know like how to do my website for like when my server status is either online or offline like it will say it on my website with out me messing with it and automaticly say online if its online and offline if its offline

item.title: Online Status
item.dc:creator: @SandScape SandScape
item.description:
@SandScape wrote:

[quote=“warlock 999, post:9, topic:265677”]I think this is what you mean?

<if condition="$onlinestatus==0">is <span class="smallfont">Offline</span></if> <if condition="$onlinestatus==1">is <span class="smallfont" style="color:#cdf16c;">Online</span></if> <if condition="$onlinestatus==2">is <span class="smallfont" style="color:green;">Invisible</span></if>[/quote]yes and ty for helping

Read full topic

item.title: Online Status
item.dc:creator: @warlock_999 warlock 999
item.description:
@warlock_999 wrote:

I think this is what you mean?

item.title: Online Status
item.dc:creator: @chassy13 Chassy13
item.description:
@chassy13 wrote:

[quote=“SandScape, post:7, topic:265677”][quote author=Chassy13 link=topic=350727.msg2693967#msg2693967 date=1236129275]
How is this about a webclient? You didn’t say the word webclient in your post at all. You’re asking basically for a status checker. If you want a webclient, maybe you could have used the search bar and found the multiple tutorials.
[/quote]wow i dont get why your here your obviously a waiste of time and no good for moparscape server help forums so please stop replying your causing nothing but trouble and your not helping at all[/quote]

I suggest you buy a dictionary. It isn’t my fault I am following the rules and reporting topics such as this one. Plus, even if this was about a webclient…wrong section.

Read full topic

@SandScape wrote:

[quote=“Chassy13, post:4, topic:265677”][quote author=SandScape link=topic=350727.msg2693947#msg2693947 date=1236128679]
exactly server help it has something to do with my server
onto my website just like if i was to ask for help for a webclient read the rules first
[/quote]

You’re an idiot. You’re asking about something that is made on the website.[/quote]maybe yu dont get it…
theres something called a webclient.and people ask questions about webclients all the time here
and a webclient is built on a website which is yours and you said no asking about website stuff well if you can ask about webclient stuff i can ask about that they both have something to do with your server so again before posting read the rules right/correct
